etymology.description: 燕麦 + 粥 = oats + porridge → oatmeal porridge
etymology.interpretation: Combines the grain name with the generic term for porridge to denote porridge made from oats. Focuses on preparation (粥) rather than a specific recipe.
etymology.simplification: Only 麥 → 麦 was simplified, reducing strokes by compressing components; 燕 and 粥 remain the same.

examples.chinese: 我早餐常喝燕麦粥(我早餐常喝燕麥粥)。
examples.english: I often drink oatmeal porridge for breakfast.

examples.chinese: 燕麦粥容易消化(燕麥粥容易消化)，适合老人和孩子(適合老人和孩子)。
examples.pinyin: Yànmàizhōu róngyì xiāohuà, shìhé lǎorén hé háizi.
examples.english: Oatmeal porridge is easy to digest and is suitable for the elderly and children.

examples.chinese: 有时我会在燕麦粥里加蜂蜜和蓝莓(有時我會在燕麥粥裡加蜂蜜和藍莓)。
examples.pinyin: Yǒushí wǒ huì zài yànmàizhōu lǐ jiā fēngmì hé lánméi.
examples.english: Sometimes I add honey and blueberries to my oatmeal porridge.
